ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Does Heritrix considers the hash (#) in a URL?
ygData.msgSnippet: (sorry, forgot to reply to list) I agree that it s a hack of course, but some (mainly Ajax based) sites store informations in the hash. In such a site, I could
